peachbox.dwh module¶

class peachbox.dwh.DWH(fs=<peachbox.fs.s3.S3 object at 0x2afb229cca10>)[source]¶

Bases: object

Interface to the data warehouse.

static Instance()[source]¶

DWH is singleton. Access via Instance()

absorb(model, data, pail)[source]¶

Deprecated: Moved to peachbox.connector.sink

Absorbs data into the data warehouse

Parameters:
  • pail – The pail the data goes to
  • model – Data is stored with respect to the model properties, ie. type, id and schema
stop()[source]¶

peachbox.spark module¶

class peachbox.spark.Spark(spark_conf={})[source]¶

Bases: object

Interface to Apache Spark. Singleton. After initialization use peachbox.spark.Instance() to access the existing instance.:

class HelloWorld()
    def __init__():
static Instance()[source]¶

Spark is a singleton. Access via Instance()

context()[source]¶

Spark context

get_spark_conf()[source]¶
initialize()[source]¶
sql_context()[source]¶

Returns a SQLContext, which is the entry point to PySparks’ data frames.
